title: SmartFormat
description: A string composition library written in C# that can format data into a string with a minimal, intuitive syntax. It uses extensions to provide named placeholders, pluralization, gender conjugation, and time and list formatting. Project hosted on GitHub https://github.com/scottrippey/SmartFormat.NET
authors: Scott Rippey, Bernhard Millauer, Norbert Bietsch and other contributors.
